Class TestBase

java.lang.Object
test.gov.cdc.izgateway.v2tofhir.TestBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils.ErrorReporter
public class TestBase extends Object implements gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils.ErrorReporter
Base class for many tests, providing support methods to get test data.
Author:
Audacious Inquiry

    TestBase.NamedSegment
